foreignData.name: Schutzbann des Kurators
foreignData.text:
Verzaubert eine bleibende Karte
Die verzauberte bleibende Karte hat Fluchsicherheit.
Wenn die verzauberte bleibende Karte das Spiel verlässt und falls sie historisch war, ziehe zwei Karten. (Legenden, Artefakte und Sagen sind historisch.)

foreignData.name: Protección del conservador
foreignData.text:
Encantar permanente.
El permanente encantado tiene la habilidad de antimaleficio.
Cuando el permanente encantado deje el campo de batalla, si era histórico, roba dos cartas. (Los artefactos, las Sagas y las cartas legendarias son cartas históricas.)

foreignData.name: Rune de garde du conservateur
foreignData.text:
Enchanter : permanent
Le permanent enchanté a la défense talismanique.
Quand le permanent enchanté quitte le champ de bataille, s'il était historique, piochez deux cartes. (Les artefacts, les légendaires et les sagas sont historiques.)

foreignData.name: Sigillo del Sovrintendente
foreignData.text:
Incanta permanente
Il permanente incantato ha anti-malocchio.
Quando il permanente incantato lascia il campo di battaglia, se era storico, pesca due carte. (Artefatti, carte leggendarie e Saghe sono carte storiche.)

foreignData.name: 史学者の護法印
foreignData.text:
エンチャント（パーマネント）
エンチャントされているパーマネントは呪禁を持つ。
エンチャントされているパーマネントが戦場を離れたとき、それが歴史的であった場合、カードを２枚引く。（歴史的とは、アーティファクトと伝説と英雄譚のことである。）
foreignData.type: エンチャント — オーラ

foreignData.name: 학예사의 보호
foreignData.text:
지속물에 부여
부여된 지속물은 방호를 가진다.
부여된 지속물이 전장을 떠날 때, 그 지속물이 역사적이라면, 카드 두 장을 뽑는다. (마법물체와 전설적, 서사시가 역사적이다.)

foreignData.name: Proteção do Curador
foreignData.text:
Encantar permanente
A permanente encantada tem resistência a magia.
Quando a permanente encantada deixar o campo de batalha, se ela for histórica, compre dois cards. (Os artefatos, os cards lendários e as Sagas são cards históricos.)

foreignData.name: Оберег Куратора
foreignData.text:
Зачаровать перманент
Зачарованный перманент имеет Порчеустойчивость.
Когда зачарованный перманент покидает поле битвы, если он был историческим, возьмите две карты. (Артефакты, легендарные карты и Саги являются историческими.)

foreignData.name: 馆长守护
foreignData.text:
结附于永久物
所结附的永久物具有辟邪异能。
当所结附的永久物离开战场时，若它是史迹，则抓两张牌。（神器、传奇和传纪是史迹。）

foreignData.name: 館長守護
foreignData.text:
結附於永久物
所結附的永久物具有辟邪異能。
當所結附的永久物離開戰場時，若它是史跡，則抽兩張牌。（神器、傳奇和傳紀是史跡。）

name: Curator's Ward
originalText:
Enchant permanent
Enchanted permanent has hexproof.
When enchanted permanent leaves the battlefield, if it was historic, draw two cards. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

rulings.text: If Curator’s Ward is attached to a historic permanent you don’t control, you draw two cards when that permanent leaves the battlefield, not that permanent’s controller.
If you give hexproof to an opponent’s permanent, such as by enchanting it with Curator’s Ward, that player can still target that permanent, but you can’t.

A card, spell, or permanent is historic if it has the legendary supertype, the artifact card type, or the Saga subtype. Having two of those qualities doesn’t make an object more historic than another or provide an additional bonus—an object either is historic or it isn’t.

text:
Enchant permanent
Enchanted permanent has hexproof.
When enchanted permanent leaves the battlefield, if it was historic, draw two cards. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)
